comments.en:
The Color LaserJet 1500 is a USB laser printer with a 2003 street price of $600-$800 USD.

The Color LaserJet 1500L comes with a multi-purpose tray only, the Color LaserJet 1500 comes with an additional 250-sheet tray.

Consumables/Refills: Toner Black (5000 prints) - $70 Toner Cyan (4000 prints) - $90 Toner Magenta (4000 prints) - $90 Toner Yellow (4000 prints) - $90 Imaging Drum (20000 prints) - $160 Part numbers: C9700A, C9701A, C9703A, C9702A, C9704A
